COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2
STRING: When I woke up in the morning, my body felt heavy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe
STRING: Recently, there had been many days where I had woken
up still feeling tired from the previous day. I thought
today was another one of those days...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x114
STRING: My body felt warm, and it seemed I also had a fever.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120
STRING: It had been such a long time since this last happened
that I didn't understand it at first, but it appeared that I
had caught a cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: Chris and I had only just talked about it yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e
STRING: “Why do I want to make it the best recital ever?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a
STRING: I couldn't afford not to practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166
STRING: And besides, regardless of the result of the letter sent
the day before yesterday, I had a reason why I had to
keep practicing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c
STRING: I had to give the best performance I could, because this
recital could be the last memory that I make with him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192
STRING: In the end, that may have been all I had left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8
STRING: I was anxious about the unforeseen future, and I didn't
think I could keep moving forward unless I had
something to hold fast to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204
STRING: Almost as if dragging my heavy body, I finally made it to
Chris's place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a
STRING: As long as I could make it simply look like I was still
tired, everything would be okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230
STRING: And besides, I hardly ever felt any fatigue when I was
singing, so as long as we kept rehearsing, I'd be fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x246
STRING: Just like I always did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252
STRING: I put on a smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e
STRING: [Torta] “Sorry! I overslept.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x294
STRING: Speaking cheerfully, I just made it on time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc
STRING: [Chris] “Morning... Wow, even you oversleep, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d2
STRING: [Torta] “Of course. About once a year or so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x304
STRING: [Chris] “I guess it happens to everyone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a
STRING: If I sat down and rested, I didn't think I would be able to
get up again, so I quickly started to get ready for
rehearsal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x330
STRING: If I could just hear the sound of the Fortelle, and start
singing...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33c
STRING: I'm sure I could make it to the end of the day somehow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x348
STRING: And then if I rested until morning, I'd be okay tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x370
STRING: [Chris] “Torta, could I have a minute?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x386
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39c
STRING: The way he suddenly spoke to me made me nervous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a8
STRING: I just wanted to hurry up and start rehearsing...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b4
STRING: [Torta] “Hey, hey!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ca
STRING: Chris grabbed my hand, not saying a word.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f2
STRING: [Chris] “Your hand is hot...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x408
STRING: [Torta] “That's because it was cold outside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x426
STRING: [Chris] “Hold still.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43c
STRING: His voice wasn't loud, and his tone was not like he was
accusing me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x452
STRING: But, the moment he spoke I became unable to move or
resist.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45e
STRING: Chris place a cold hand on my forehead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x472
STRING: [Chris] “Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x488
STRING: [Torta] “Wh-What do you think you're doing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a6
STRING: [Chris] “If you're not feeling well, why didn't you say so?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4bc
STRING: [Torta] “I feel fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4da
STRING: [Chris] “You're lying. That much I can tell.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f0
STRING: I tried repeatedly to remove his hand from my forehead,
but I just didn't have the strength.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x506
STRING: If I could just sing...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x512
STRING: As stupid as it was, that was the thought that came in
and out of my head, as if I was delirious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x528
STRING: [Torta] “Take your hand off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55a
STRING: [Chris] “If you're feeling well, then I'm sure you can
remove it yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57a
STRING: [Torta] “You're being mean...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ac
STRING: [Chris] “You caught a cold, didn't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c2
STRING: [Torta] “Kind of.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f4
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, listen here. We're not going to get any
decent practice in with you in this condition. You know
that, don't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x614
STRING: [Torta] “I didn't come here just because I thought I
might be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x632
STRING: [Chris] “Well, you're not okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x648
STRING: The moment he came to this conclusion, I started to
feel I wasn't okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x654
STRING: My strength left my body, and I didn't have the energy
to argue.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67c
STRING: [Chris] “Just sit yourself down. I'll make you something
warm to drink.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a0
STRING: My head was becoming hazy, and I started to feel like
nothing mattered anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ac
STRING: My body no longer felt heavy, but light as if it were
floating, which made me feel dizzy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c2
STRING: Sitting as I was, I felt I was no longer able to resist
gravity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f4
STRING: [Chris] “Here you are. Drink this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70a
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x720
STRING: I sipped from the cup of warm milk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72c
STRING: The heat made my throat hurt a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x738
STRING: I guess that in the end I wouldn't have been able to sing
today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x760
STRING: [Chris] “Speaking of which, didn't you tell Ninna?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x776
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? No, I didn't say a thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: [Chris] “You've got to at least tell Ninna...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7be
STRING: [Torta] “If I said anything, she wouldn't have let me
leave the house.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7dc
STRING: [Chris] “If you knew it was that bad, then why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f2
STRING: [Torta] “Does it really matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x808
STRING: I placed my cup on the table, and took a deep breath.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x830
STRING: [Chris] “You should probably head home today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x846
STRING: [Torta] “I'll be fine if I rest a little. Do you know many
days we have left to practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x866
STRING: Just saying that was tiring, and I knew that I was lying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x898
STRING: [Chris] “Practice, practice... That's all you've been saying
since yesterday. Why are you being so obsessive?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b8
STRING: [Torta] “Because I want the recital to be perfect. Don't
make me repeat myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ea
STRING: [Chris] “I'm only asking because you haven't answered
my question, Torta. In that case, why do you want it to
be perfect? Actually, no, why does it have to be
perfect? For my sake? There's more to it than that, isn't
there?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x914
STRING: [Torta] “Well if it's not for your sake, then it has to be
for mine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x946
STRING: [Chris] “You want to become a professional musician? Is
that your dream?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95c
STRING: I wanted to create a special memory with Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x968
STRING: But from my mouth, all that came out were lies.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x974
STRING: Most conveniently, and horribly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x980
STRING: [Torta] “I do. I've been saying I wanted to be a
professional ever since I was a kid.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a8
STRING: [Chris] “Is that really all?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9be
STRING: [Torta] “That's it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d4
STRING: Chris looked at me as if he could see right through me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e0
STRING: For just a moment I felt fear creep into my heart, but I
couldn't back down now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa08
STRING: [Chris] “I feel like you've just been lying since yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1e
STRING: [Torta] “What makes you think that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3c
STRING: [Chris] “I guess it's okay to assume you admit it, then,
since you're asking that question.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5c
STRING: [Torta] “I just want to know why I'm being
misunderstood.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8e
STRING: [Chris] “You know... We're not going to get anywhere
talking like this. In any case, you're going home. Rest up
properly, and let's rehearse again when you're better.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad4
STRING: [Chris] “And this time, at a more moderate pace.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaea
STRING: [Torta] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1c
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb32
STRING: [Torta] “I can sing. If I just rest a little, I'll be fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb64
STRING: [Chris] “No way, I'm taking you home. Wait here a sec,
I'll go buy an umbrella from somewhere.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb84
STRING: [Torta] “I said I don't want to go home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba2
STRING: [Chris] “And I said you can't stay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb8
STRING: [Torta] “Just wait a little longer. You don't know, I might
get better soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbea
STRING: [Chris] “Why are you being like this...? I don't get why
you're being so difficult.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc00
STRING: [Torta] “Just... Wait a little longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc32
STRING: [Chris] “For what? For you to start feeling better?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc48
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5e
STRING: I'd get better if I rested.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6a
STRING: That was probably a lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc76
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc9e
STRING: [Chris] “Fine. You can use my bed, so at least lie down
for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcbe
STRING: [Torta] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce0
STRING: Chris stood up, and went back and forth across his
apartment, getting new sheets and changing his bed for
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf6
STRING: While doing so, he looked at me many times, as if
watching over me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd02
STRING: Sitting on the chair, I thought about everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: I didn't want to go home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1a
STRING: I just wanted to sing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd26
STRING: That was clear to me now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd32
STRING: I just wanted to sing and sing, over and over again, to
the sound of Chris's Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd48
STRING: How many more chances would I have to do so?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd54
STRING: How many more days did I have...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd60
STRING: I didn't have much time left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6c
STRING: If Chris didn't choose me...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd78
STRING: There was a high possibility that he wouldn't.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd84
STRING: A painfully high possibility...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb8
STRING: [Chris] “Why don't you sleep a little?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdce
STRING: I felt that if I lay down on the bed, I wouldn't be able to
get back up again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde4
STRING: My heavy body practically absorbed his kind voice, and
I could barely keep myself from smiling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfa
STRING: I couldn't let myself give in to his kindness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe06
STRING: I wanted to just ask him what his answer was, if only I
could.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe12
STRING: If he kept being so kind to me, I felt like I would just
blurt it all out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe28
STRING: [Torta] “It's kind of hard to sleep with you watching me
from over there like that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe46
STRING: [Chris] “In that case, shall I play you a lullaby or
something on my Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5c
STRING: [Torta] “No, I'll start singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7a
STRING: [Chris] “Aha-ha, I guess that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe90
STRING: How happy I would be, if I could just sing right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9c
STRING: Even if I had no voice, just hearing Chris play the
Fortelle would be enough.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb2
STRING: But then, I might cry if he played.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec6
STRING: [Chris] “I can go out for a while if you can't sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xedc
STRING: [Torta] “To where?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefa
STRING: [Chris] “I'll do some shopping. Is there anything you'd
like to eat?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf10
STRING: [Torta] “Some fruit would be nice, if you can find some.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf26
STRING: I didn't have an appetite, but I knew that I had to eat
something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3c
STRING: I wasn't able to hide my cold today, so now I had to do
everything I could for tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5a
STRING: [Chris] “By the way, did you eat breakfast?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf70
STRING: [Torta] “I didn't have an appetite, so I skipped breakfast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8e
STRING: [Chris] “Alright... Well, I'll be back soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa4
STRING: [Torta] “Ah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfba
STRING: Seeing Chris get out of his chair, I accidentally let my
voice escape.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd0
STRING: It truly happened unconsciously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfdc
STRING: The moment I thought that Chris would leave... Made
me feel something sad, and almost regretful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffa
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? Is something wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1010
STRING: [Torta] “No... It's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1026
STRING: I wonder when it was?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1032
STRING: Chris once came to our house when he had caught a
cold, and slept in the guest room on the second floor.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1048
STRING: When he was in bed, Chris said something to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: “Don't leave me alone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1060
STRING: It might not have been meant for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106c
STRING: When he woke up later and I mentioned it, he got
angry and claimed he never said it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1082
STRING: So, perhaps he was dreaming, and it was meant for my
sister.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108e
STRING: I was thinking back on this and how I probably felt the
same way now... Just then, Chris stared at me, and
smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ac
STRING: [Chris] “I was going to head out, but... I think I'll stick
around a little longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10cc
STRING: [Torta] “Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ea
STRING: [Chris] “I'm a bit tired after changing the sheets...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1100
STRING: [Torta] “Weakling.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111e
STRING: [Chris] “Wow, sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1134
STRING: [Torta] “＊sigh＊ I don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1152
STRING: [Chris] “Well, get some sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1168
STRING: Chris wasn't a good liar.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1174
STRING: But at the moment, that made me happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119c
STRING: I closed my eyes, and just thought about resting my
body.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f8
STRING: A voice...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1204
STRING: A nostalgic, singing voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1210
STRING: Slightly out of tune, but none the less beautiful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121c
STRING: Gradually, a vivid memory came back to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1264
STRING: It was... A time when Arie caught a cold, and then it
passed it on to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127a
STRING: Arie apologized to me again and again, and looked
after me, because she had already gotten better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1290
STRING: She wouldn't listen to mother, who told her she was in
the way, and instead stubbornly looked after me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a8
STRING: She even played the piano, which she had never even
touched before...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b4
STRING: It was the worst piano playing I'd ever heard...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c0
STRING: Nevertheless, she tried to sing while she played, and I
was forced to listen to this music, which probably made
me feel worse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d6
STRING: I desperately felt the need to get better, and in the end
I recovered within the same day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ec
STRING: Arie smiled proudly, claiming that it was thanks to her
that I got better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1302
STRING: It annoyed me beyond belief, but even then, that was
what I liked about Arie...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1318
STRING: I hugged her, saying I'd pass the cold back to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1324
STRING: And that this time... I'd sing her for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1334
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1340
STRING: But, Arie never caught a cold again after that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134c
STRING: And now, I can't even sing for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135a
STRING: While Chris was in hospital, I sang to Arie at her
bedside, again and again, but she didn't show any
response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1370
STRING: I wanted to tell her when she woke up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x137e
STRING: That it was thanks to me that she got better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138a
STRING: That's what I wanted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f2
STRING: A gentle voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13fe
STRING: The lullaby ended, and the room went silent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140a
STRING: I could feel the tears on my cheeks.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1416
STRING: I couldn't open my eyes, even if I had wanted to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1444
STRING: And, again...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1450
STRING: Arie started singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145c
STRING: Such a lovely voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1468
STRING: And a beautiful melody.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x147e
STRING: No... There's no way that could be her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148a
STRING: Arie couldn't sing this well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1496
STRING: That wouldn't matter, however, if this was a dream.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a2
STRING: [Torta] “Arie...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b8
STRING: I was afraid of waking from my dream, but I forced my
eyes open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ce
STRING: I couldn't allow myself to dwell in my memories like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14da
STRING: What I was trying to do may have been a betrayal to
Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f0
STRING: Everything would depend on how Chris answered, but
that couldn't change the fact that I thought this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1538
STRING: When I opened my eyes...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1544
STRING: I was in Chris's empty room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1550
STRING: And of course, no one else was there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x155c
STRING: Chris said that he was going to head out, so he must
have left quietly while I slept.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1572
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1588
STRING: I wiped my cheeks with my hand, as they were still wet
from the tears.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: I wondered why those memories had come back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a0
STRING: I loved Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ac
STRING: Those feelings were completely different to the ones I
had for Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b8
STRING: Even though I never remembered them anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c4
STRING: I started to feel unsure again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d0
STRING: Was what I was trying to do, really the right thing?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15dc
STRING: [Torta] “Arie... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f2
STRING: I whispered to Arie, who wasn't here, and closed my
eyes once again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1642
STRING: I felt like I heard a voice, someplace far away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164e
STRING: I suppose I had only slept a few hours, as I was still
feeling unwell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1664
STRING: I wanted to keep sleeping, but I thought that someone
might have been talking to me, so I forced my eyes
open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a2
STRING: [Torta] “Did you say something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b8
STRING: Looking over, I realized that Chris had come home at
some point, and was now sitting in a chair, watching
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d6
STRING: [Chris] “I was just talking to myself. You should get
some more sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ec
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170a
STRING: [Chris] “How are you feeling? And be honest.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1720
STRING: [Torta] “Still not so good...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x173e
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm, alright. Are you hungry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1754
STRING: [Torta] “Not in the slightest.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1772
STRING: [Chris] “Do you think you could eat some fruit? It's not
good that you haven't eaten anything since morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1792
STRING: [Torta] “I never, ever thought I'd hear that coming from
you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ba
STRING: [Chris] “This is different. Well?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d0
STRING: [Torta] “I don't think I'll eat just yet...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ee
STRING: [Chris] “I see. In that case, get a bit more sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1804
STRING: [Torta] “＊sigh＊ Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182c
STRING: I closed my eyes again, and tried to fall asleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1838
STRING: I felt like I wanted to sleep again immediately after I
woke up, but I realized that it might not be so easy now
that I was wide awake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1858
STRING: I went and opened my eyes again, and decided to talk
to Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x187c
STRING: [Torta] “I can't sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x189a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, okay. Then, shall we talk about something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b0
STRING: [Torta] “The graduation recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ce
STRING: [Chris] “In a broad sense, I guess it would include that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e4
STRING: [Torta] “You're being persistent...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1902
STRING: [Chris] “Well since you know what I'm getting at, want
to tell me what's going on?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1922
STRING: I wasn't confident that I could keep talking while
looking at Chris's eyes, so I closed my own and began
to speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1938
STRING: I must have been feeling weak because of my cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1944
STRING: I felt like I could say things that I would normally never
be able to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195a
STRING: [Torta] “I don't have anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1978
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198e
STRING: [Torta] “I've practiced really hard for the last three years.
I've received recognition from my teachers, and have
enjoyed becoming a better singer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19b8
STRING: [Torta] “But, what I wanted wasn't recognition or to
improve, or anything like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f2
STRING: [Torta] “Chris... I like you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a08
STRING: I suppose this means I finally said it...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1e
STRING: I hadn't really been trying to hide it, and I knew that
Chris had already been aware.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a34
STRING: But I felt that if I actually said it, that everything would
change, so I had never had the bravery to do so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4a
STRING: Really, I shouldn't have been saying this kind of thing
right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a56
STRING: But, even just saying that much was a weight off my
shoulders.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a62
STRING: That was all I was able to think of at the moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6e
STRING: The dream I had of Arie, Chris's kindness... It was as if
all of these things had been tormenting me, and I
wanted to be free of them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a84
STRING: There was no need to wait for Chris's letter to arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a90
STRING: He could just say he didn't have feelings for me, right
here and now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a9c
STRING: I could write another letter to clear things up
immediately.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa8
STRING: “I'm so sorry about my last letter. Please forget what I
wrote. I hope everything can be the same as it always
was.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1abe
STRING: Knowing Chris, he would surely reply...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aca
STRING: “I love only you, Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad6
STRING: [Torta] “Aren't you going to say anything?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aec
STRING: I waited for Chris to say he felt differently, and
apologize.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af8
STRING: And perhaps... I also had the faintest little hope that he
would say it was me he liked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0e
STRING: But, Chris didn't give an answer, only words that
prompted me to go on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2c
STRING: [Chris] “Not yet... So, don't stop.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b42
STRING: Actually... It might have been a good opportunity to
just let it all out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b58
STRING: I decided to tell him the truth, with the exception of a
couple of massive lies that I just couldn't speak of.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6e
STRING: [Torta] “Okay... I like you Chris... And I'd always wished
we could share something special.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8e
STRING: [Torta] “Of course, I understand that it's Arie that you
have feelings for. I'm not saying I want you to suddenly
have feelings for me, or anything like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb8
STRING: I guess that was a lie...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc4
STRING: I wanted him to have feelings for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd0
STRING: I knew these feelings would go unrequited, but I still
hoped none the less.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bdc
STRING: Would the day ever really come that I could tell Chris
the truth?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf2
STRING: But then, if that meant that Chris may end up hating me,
perhaps it would be better for both of us if that day
never came.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c12
STRING: [Torta] “I just wanted to share a special memory with
you. In the very end, I get to perform with you in the
most important recital we'll ever do, so I just wanted to
make it the best it could be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c3c
STRING: [Torta] “I don't have any memories just with you, Chris...
None at all... So, I'll be happy with just one... I want to
put everything I have into it, make it the best recital,
and create a special memory.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c70
STRING: It was a jumble of both lies and truth, and even I
couldn't understand what I was saying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c86
STRING: I closed my eyes in order to calm myself, but I found
myself unable to open them again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c9c
STRING: I didn't feel like I would be able to look Chris in the
eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cb8
STRING: A few minutes passed, almost as if I was in meditation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc4
STRING: During that time, I suppose I was lucky that Chris didn't
say anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cda
STRING: When I opened my eyes, I somehow managed to find
my composure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d10
STRING: [Torta] “You don't have anything to say, do you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2e
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d44
STRING: [Torta] “You don't need to apologize. I understand.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6c
STRING: [Chris] “No, that's not it. I also...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d82
STRING: He also...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8e
STRING: Was he saying he also felt that way?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d9a
STRING: No, he couldn't be.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da6
STRING: There's no way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dba
STRING: [Chris] “Forget it... It's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd0
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. I'm going back to sleep. I still don't feel so
well. I'll go home tonight, so let me sleep here until
then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e02
STRING: [Chris] “You can stay as long as you need to...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e18
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2e
STRING: Chris... Definitely started to say something with the
words “I also.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e56
STRING: Why did he make me feel like there was hope?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e62
STRING: Was Chris to blame for saying such words?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6e
STRING: Or was it me who was at fault, for seeking only the
words I wanted to hear?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e84
STRING: And furthermore... I still hadn't heard his response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e90
STRING: He hadn't said whether he had feelings for me or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea6
STRING: I fell asleep again the moment I started to think deeply
about what that had meant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ef4
STRING: Perhaps because I had slept all day, but I didn't seem to
be feeling so bad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f00
STRING: Compared to how I stumbled my way here in the
morning, I was much better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f16
STRING: Chris held his umbrella over my head, though it wasn't
even raining.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2c
STRING: He held it over my side more, as if to say he didn't mind
getting wet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f5e
STRING: [Chris] “Do you think you'll need to rest tomorrow, too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f74
STRING: [Torta] “I'm not sure yet...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa6
STRING: [Chris] “If you don't think you'll be okay, just let me
know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fbc
STRING: [Torta] “You're just saying that because you don't want
to practice... Guess there's no need to give it everything
anymore.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe4
STRING: [Chris] “Wait, I'll still work hard.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ffa
STRING: [Torta] “Why...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2018
STRING: [Chris] “We're going to make this the best recital ever,
aren't we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202e
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, I get it... You need to make sure you can
still graduate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2060
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, whatever you say...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2076
STRING: After walking for another five minutes or so, I stopped
and stood still.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2082
STRING: [Torta] “This is far enough, I can walk the rest by myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b4
STRING: [Chris] “I'm taking you all the way home, no buts.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ca
STRING: [Torta] “Really, I'm okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e8
STRING: [Chris] “Between yesterday and today, you've lied to me
a whole bunch of times, so I'm not believing that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2108
STRING: [Torta] “I really, truly am!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2126
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, sure, you can tell me all about it when we
get to your place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x213c
STRING: And again, Chris held the umbrella more over my side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2148
STRING: Didn't he realize that over half of his body wasn't under
the umbrella?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x215e
STRING: Or, was he aware but still holding it over me
regardless?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216a
STRING: [Torta] “Fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2180
STRING: I gave up trying to send him home, and the two of us
kept walking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ca
STRING: [Ninna] “You're home a little late tonight.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21fc
STRING: [Chris] “Good evening, Ninna. It's Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2212
STRING: [Torta] “I'm home...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2228
STRING: Chris folded up his umbrella, and stood it near the front
door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2234
STRING: He then suddenly took my hand, and walked me over to
Grandma.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2266
STRING: [Ninna] “Is that you, Chris...? What brings you here at
such a late hour?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2298
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry to come by so late at night. It seems
that Torta has caught a cold, but she still came over to
rehearse. I was worried about her, so I walked her
home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c2
STRING: [Torta] “It's really not such a big deal, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22d8
STRING: Still holding my hand, he dragged me over and stood
me in front of Grandma. I started to feel like a child
again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f6
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230c
STRING: [Torta] “It's just a cold. I'll be better by the time I wake
up tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x233e
STRING: [Chris] “That's what Torta says, Ninna, but if her fever
hasn't gone down tomorrow, could you please decide if
she should be getting out of bed or not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2384
STRING: [Ninna] “Yes, of course. Thank you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23b6
STRING: [Chris] “Not at all. Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23cc
STRING: [Torta] “In any case, we're practicing here tomorrow, so
make sure you arrive by ten, got it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2408
STRING: [Chris] “No problem, I'll be here. But, if Ninna says you're
still sick, then you're staying in bed, alright?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2428
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2446
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x245c
STRING: [Torta] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x247a
STRING: [Ninna] “Good. Now, have you eaten anything? You
didn't have breakfast, did you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x249a
STRING: [Torta] “I ate a few things at Chris's place, so I'm okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24b8
STRING: [Ninna] “Oh. In that case you should just rest for today.
I'll check on you tomorrow morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24d8
STRING: [Torta] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ee
STRING: That was the only answer I could give.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24fa
STRING: Not being able to practice tomorrow would be a
problem, but I didn't want to cause any more trouble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2510
STRING: Not for Chris, and not for Grandma.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x251c
STRING: I nodded, and did as I was told and went to my room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2544
STRING: What should I do about tomorrow?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2550
STRING: If my cold didn't get better, I wondered if I would I really
have to spend the entire day in bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2566
STRING: Chris's letter was supposed to arrive tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2572
STRING: I wondered what kind of response Chris would write.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x257e
STRING: If it were even possible, I'd switch that letter I wrote for
another one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x258a
STRING: But, I couldn't, and I didn't want to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2596
STRING: [Torta] “I'm so stupid...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ac
STRING: Perhaps it was because of all the lies I had told, but
now I felt my emotions were lying too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25b8
STRING: I was so ashamed that I wanted to switch the letters,
but in the end, deep down I didn't want to change
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ce
STRING: I awaited his response to my letter, in which I asked if
he had feelings for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ee
STRING: “No, that's not it. I also...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2604
STRING: I wanted to know what words were going to come
next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2610
STRING: Even if it meant betraying Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x261c
STRING: Even if it meant using my beloved sister.
